## IBuffer interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IBuffer 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [resetState()](./core.ibuffer.resetstate.md) | Resets the state of the buffer, such as dirty check ids. If the buffer was initialized it does not require reinitialization. |
